import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { SavatchaContext } from "../../context/savatcha"; const Korzinka = () => { const [dataSavat, setDataSavat] = useContext(SavatchaContext); return (

{dataSavat[0]?.title}

{dataSavat[0]?.price && dataSavat[0]?.price + " USD"}

{many} - ta

); }; export default Korzinka;
